snippet: The European Central Bank announced a set of unexpected measures that will include, in effect, paying commercial banks to lend money to businesses and consumers.
abstract: European Central Bank, confronting moribund eurozone economy, announces stimulation measures, including paying commercial banks money to borrow central bank funds; cuts its main interest rates to ward off deflation.
lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank announced a set of unexpected measures that will include, in effect, paying commercial banks to lend money to businesses and consumers.

headline.main: E.C.B.’s Bold Stimulus Takes Aim at Eurozone Economy
headline.print_headline: Bold Push by Europe’s Central Bank to Shore Up Economy
